title: Bcrypt Identifier
description:
Identify this hash format:

$2b$12$LJ3m4ys8Lp5Uf5E0j1GUKO6YVfGDNOqLxoGq.HQg3zGHnR.EkJCe

What hashing algorithm produced this hash?

Additionally, what does the '$12$' portion indicate?

Submit as: flag{algorithm_costfactor} (e.g., flag{md5_10})
hints: The number after it (12) is a work factor / cost parameter
This algorithm is designed to be intentionally slow for password storage
